Author: Lily
Name: BISBuddy
Description:
Highlights gear, coffers, and materia needed for all your gearsets. Imports directly from Etro or Xivgear for frictionless setup.

Highlights items needed for gearsets on:
    - Need/Greed Loot Windows
    - NPC Shops and Exchanges
    - Marketboard
    - Player Inventories
    - Item Tooltips

When melding materia, highlights:
    - Items to meld
    - Materia to meld to item

Automatically syncs gearsets with player inventory
